title: Speed scene: the problem of amphetamine abuse
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Amphetamine drugs

description: Presents evidence against the use of amphetamines in any form other than for medical purposes. Discusses psychological dependency on these drugs and how it often leads to other more dangerous, addictive drugs. Notes the most malignant form of amphetamine, one type of which is called "Speed".
